tool_description: Maps and configures platform-specific settings, API endpoints, authentication methods, and data extraction patterns for different review sources.

platforms.description: List of platforms to map and configure

include_api_configs.description: Whether to include API configuration details

include_scraping_patterns.description: Whether to include web scraping patterns

region.description: Geographic region for platform configurations (US, EU, APAC, Global)

update_cache.description: Whether to update platform configuration cache

error_messages: Unsupported platform: One or more platforms are not supported or recognized.
Invalid region: Region must be US, EU, APAC, or Global.
Configuration unavailable: Platform configuration is temporarily unavailable.
Cache update failed: Unable to update platform configuration cache.
usage: Provide platform names to retrieve configuration details, API endpoints, and extraction patterns for review collection setup.

platform_configs.description: Platform-specific configuration details in JSON format

rate_limits.description: Rate limiting information for each platform
